title: Sans serif mish-mash
content:
Hi there,

This one has a geometic 'C', but the 'R' seems like a clumsy Grotesque... obviously a cheap font... any ideas?

Cheers

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415051819im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture-1_5446.jpg)
author: Chris Washer

comments.content:
Get a better font? (Sorry I couldn't resist, but seriously, that's not a bad idea. This one looks like an amateur effort.) Why are you trying to locate the font, if I may ask? Are you open to suggestions of similar, more professional-looking fonts?

- Mike Yanega
